title: Design Patterns and Practical Applications for Sustainable AI Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Training program where in-service professionals systematically integrate sustainability elements into AI development processes, supplemented by web-based tool practice and team projects

learning_goals: Classify and explain 35 design patterns that integrate ESG elements into the four stages of the ML development lifecycle (planning-development-deployment-maintenance).
Design AI systems that reflect organizational ESG requirements by leveraging insights from expert interviews.
Apply the SML-DPM framework to real-world cases using web-based tools and measure sustainability metrics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
